segments.text: Look at that messâ€”the sink overflowing like a fountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out, soaking the floor and cabinets; it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, drying a plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, probably full of soap scum too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids rummaging in the cookie jar, hands all sticky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs splayed out, dirty from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, who knows if she's washed her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen hygiene is appalling with all that water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies getting crumbs all over the counter below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron will be soaked soon, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window curtains might get splashed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a sloppy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
